snippet.title: Paper Bride2 Zangling village mobile version release date confirmed！
snippet.description:
📣Dear Paper fans, 
Paper Bride2 Zangling village mobile version  is coming soon! 🎊Today we finally confirmed that -🗓 on May 20th, Google and IOS will be released at the same time!📣

"The dream, the dream again, the same nightmare that has been haunting me since I was a child, I always dream that there is someone who is a bride in a paper dress tied to an old tree in Zangling Village…To resolve this nightmare, I could only return to the place in my dream - Zangling Village."

We will follow the young girl to explore the weird customs and historical origins of Zangling Village.🔎

💌Let's meet in Zangling Village on May 20th!💌

🎏During the period of reservation, we also prepared our community event~ From now on, please follow our official Facebook fan page. If the number of our official Facebook fans reaches a certain number, we will send all of our paper fans coins after the game is released, which can help you to break through more stages! Up to 15 coins! Come and tell your friends to follow us! 

😽Event Details:https://www.xingchihuyu.com/landing/zlc_overseas/
😽Official Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/gamefpscom/

📥Pre-order Page📥
📥Google store Pre-order: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.funnygames.zjy2hw
📥App Store Pre-order：https://apps.apple.com/app/id1614398305
